thread.title: Mom wows with her homemade Star Wars costumes
thread.title_full: Mom wows with her homemade Star Wars costumes

title: Mom wows with her homemade Star Wars costumes
text:
Mom wows with her homemade Star Wars costumes KUSA, news source 12:51 p.m. EDT October 23, 2015 Corrine Kurtz's amazing Star wars costumes for her twins (Photo: Corrine Kurtz / Facebook) 
Corrine Kurtz made C-3P0 and an R2-D2 costumes and posted a video of them showing the costumes off on social media. 
Check out the video that's taking social media by storm: http://on.fb.me/1XozrRY. Post by corrine.kurtz . 
She said she used her old iPhone and loaded sound effects from C-3PO and R2-D2 onto it. Then, she and her husband connected the old iPhone to her husband's FitBit, where he controls all of the sounds. Kurtz said there are 15 sound effects loaded onto the old iPhone. 
"It took me three weeks to make them," Kurtz said. "Working on them several hours a day, and into the wee hours of the night." Remember the 10 second video of a rat carrying pizza down a New York subway? Now you can immortalize it forever! Yandy This is entitled 'Sexy Chocolate Girl Costume.' Because nothing says sexy like an Oompa Loompa http://www.yandy.com/ What have you done to Scooby Doo?! http://www.3wishes.com/ Ewoks become 'Galaxy Bear Costume.' Sure http://www.yandy.com/ Relive the madness that was "The Dress" debate. It's Blue and Black. http://www.yandy.com/ Avocados. So hot right now. http://www.costumeish.com/ Lion Killer Dentist Halloween Costume. If you decide to wear this maybe don't smile and give a thumbs up. http://www.costumeish.com/ Or you can dress as Cecil. Yandy.com Anytime Costumes pulled this costume after people continued to complain that it was offensive. Anytime Costumes Donald Trump. Well the technical name is "Donna T. Rumpshaker Costume" http://www.yandy.com/
